Novato.KCBS (AM): KCBS, 740 AM, is an all-news radio station located in San Francisco, California, which serves as the West Coast flagship station for the CBS Radio Network. It is owned by Entercom, who took over after its merger with CBS Radio, and shares its Battery Street studios with CBS owned-and-operated television station KPIX-TV (channel 5). The transmitter site is located in Novato.
